snippet: The former chairwoman of the S.E.C. will become a nonexecutive director at a time when the exchange is expanding its business in the United States.
abstract: DealBook Online; London Stock Exchange Group names former Securities and Exchange Commission chairwoman Mary L Schapiro as board member.
lead_paragraph: The former chairwoman of the S.E.C. will become a nonexecutive director at a time when the exchange is expanding its business in the United States.

headline.main: Mary Schapiro to Join London Stock Exchange Board
